member.summary: Defines the type of collision object.

member.name: F:DigitalRune.Geometry.Collisions.CollisionObjectType.Default
member.summary: A normal collision object. When this type of collision object collides with another collision object of type , the full contact details (contact points, normal vectors, penetration depths, etc.) are computed and stored in the s.

member.name: F:DigitalRune.Geometry.Collisions.CollisionObjectType.Trigger
member.summary: A collision object that is used as a trigger and does not need contact details. When this type of collision object collides with another collision object, contact details (contact points, normal vectors, penetration depths, etc.) will be omitted. The flag will be set in the s for this object. But the s will not contain any s. Use trigger collision objects instead of default collision objects to improve performance if contact details are not required.

member.name: F:DigitalRune.Geometry.Collisions.CollisionQueryType.Contacts
member.summary: A collision query that computes detailed contact information. Contact information is only computed for objects in contact, not for separated objects.

member.name: F:DigitalRune.Geometry.Collisions.CollisionQueryType.ClosestPoints
member.summary: Searching for 1 pair of closest points. The closest-points information is computed for separated objects and for objects in contact.
